channel.title: poxipd
channel.description: A blog about programming, gamedev, backends, frontends, games, etc.

item.title: It's been a year..
item.description:
It’s been a year since I created this superuseful, adorable blog. I benefit from it all the time. First of all, I want to say “Thank You” to all my readers (including my dog and fridge, WTF).

Secondly, Ima set myself some challenges for the next year: * more posts, at least 3 * more money * SWAG

I think that’s all for now, ttyl.

(yas, it’s a joke.)

item.title: Hello word!
item.description:
Ah, it seems to be a hello world post? Yeah it’s.

Why did I create this blog?

Long long time ago (about half a year or more, sic!) I was thinking of a place for my personal thoughts, to share my programming experiences, etc..So here it is.

I think that’s all what I wanted to say in this short entry and hmm.. There’ll be more posts, so you can subscribe via RSS.
